attributes.action: If they so choose, allow the option of military service in place of a custodial sentence for those under 21 who are convicted of non-violent crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of rotting in a cell, becoming hooked on drugs and emerging a hardened career criminal with no prospects at huge expense to the taxpayer, the courts must be able to give young people the option of serving their sentence for non-violent crime in the Army, Navy or Air Force where they would be paid and trained alongside regular recruits and acquire skills that will give them a future.
